name: Goblin Witch
description: A crafty goblin sorcerer, wielding dark magic and a twisted staff, feared by her kin.

inventory.name: Magic Staff
inventory.description: A twisted wooden staff, pulsing with arcane energy, used to channel spells.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: You create three glowing darts of magical force that unerringly strike their targets.

spells.name: Burning Hands
spells.description: A thin sheet of flames shoots from your hands, burning creatures in a cone.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points, healing minor wounds.
